metadata.Title: CVE-2017-16896 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description:
A SQL injection in classes/handler/public.php in the forgotpass componentof Tiny Tiny RSS 17.4 exists via the login parameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-16896` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tt-rss - 21~git20210204.b4cbc79+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tt-rss package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '21~git20210204.b4cbc79+dfsg-1').
